DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Safety Using Novel Tyto Device
DOC.detailed_description: A single center , prospective , qualitative study . Patients refer emergency department triaged accord The Canadian Triage & Acuity Scale ( CTAS ) . Patients present complaint suitable examination Tyto device ( ear/throat/respiratory/cardiac complaint ) meeting inclusion criterion inform ask consent . Patients participate study refer room dedicate purpose . A minimum hundred volunteer patient select enrolled preliminary Pilot Study . Final study design extent determine accordingly . Physical examination use Tyto device perform co-investigators , send online principle investigator remote analysis . The emergency department physician examine patient use conventional examination instrument ( i.e . stethoscope , otoscope ) . The data collect record predetermined case report form ( CRF ) , time , store analyzed principle co-investigators . The finding co-investigators ' examination compare conventional examination instrument use emergency department physician . Results check compare categorically ( 0-inconclusive ; 1-normal ; 2-pathological finding )
